segments.text: Hi , Steven . What's new with you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not too much . I'm looking to rent an apartment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I dislike my roommate . He really turns me off .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What happened ? Did you have a fight ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . He likes to leave his things about and never cleans the room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hate that , either . Did you tell him your feelings ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . But he doesn't care . I really wouldn't want to move , but I simply can â€™ t stand him .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's a problem . You'd better move .
segments.speaker: S2
